duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle customer inquiries and resolve issues in a professional and timely manner.
Effectively communicate with customers via phone and other channels, providing accurate information and assistance.
Navigate computer systems and platforms to assist customers while engaging in phone conversations.
Manage time effectively to handle multiple customer interactions simultaneously.
Demonstrate patience and a positive attitude when addressing customer concerns and inquiries.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree preferred)
